title: How do I configure the browser to save downloads directly to the microSD card?
answer:
The download path for the browser is the same as the phone's Default location. 

 The phone's factory default storage location is Internal storage. You can go to Settings, select Storage > Default location and then change the default storage location to the SD card.
keywords: file downloads, storage path, browser downloads, save downloads, storage location, storage path, microSD card
